resources.string: "This item is stored locally and available offline."
"Camera has been disabled because of security policies."
"Insert an SD card before using the camera"
"Your SD card is running out of space. Change the quality setting or delete some images or other files."
"Phone storage is running out of space. Change the quality setting or delete some images or other files."
"Time lapse feature is off. Turn it on to set time interval."
"Tag your photos and videos with the locations where they are taken.\n\nOther apps can access this information along with your saved images."
"Countdown timer duration is set to 2 seconds"
"Countdown timer duration is set to 3 seconds"
"Countdown timer duration is set to 5 seconds"
"Countdown timer duration is set to 10 seconds"
"In Settings, change resolution and quality, or try advanced features."
"You can change this later in Settings"
"Video recording will be saved automatically. Camera will be closed."
"Battery is low. Finish recording as soon as possible"
"No enough battery to successfully save the video."
"Keep arrow on the white line as much as possible.\nCapture stopped"
"Move the camera very slowly when capturing"
"TiZR lets you broadcast live video to the world. Start your journey now."
"Night mode on, hold device steady while capturing"
"HDR on, hold device steady while capturing"
"Get in the director’s chair and make your own video compilation\n(After shooting, click edit to add special themes and effects)"
"Camera requires Camera, Microphone & Storage permission to work. Optionally, location permission is needed to tag media with location information. Grant permissions in Settings."
"Tag your photos and videos with location"
"Turn GPS tagging on later in Camera settings"
"To enable GPS tagging, allow Camera permission to access Location"
"Move device continuously when taking a panorama"
"Keep the arrow on the centre line"
"Super zoom on, hold the device steadily while taking pictures"
"Take a tour and get help tips on how to use your new smartphone’s camera?"
"Touch here to take photos, or long press for burst shot of up to 10 photos"
"Use the \"Camera key\" to take photos or long press for burst shot"
"Touch here to view your recent photos"
"Touch here to start recording a video"
"Touch here to take a photo while recording"
"Touch here to stop recording and save the video"
"To take a picture, show the palm of your hand in front of the camera."
"Pinch IN/OUT on the viewfinder to zoom IN/OUT."
"Touch these icons to turn the function ON/OFF"
"Touch here to go to the camera settings"
"Swipe left or right on the viewfinder to change the camera mode."
"Touch the preview bar to switch direction."
"Touch an icon to change the manual mode option."
"Touch to show or hide manual mode options"
"This burst sequence contains %s photos. Delete all of them?"
"Unable to use flash when super zoom on"
"Phone storage is low. Camera will be closed."
"SD card storage is low. Camera will be closed."
"Phone storage is full. Clean up space or insert a SD card."
"Phone & SD storage is full. Clean up space to use the camera."
"Phone storage is full. Save to SD card?"
"SD card is full. Save to phone storage?"
"Storage is critically low. Clean up some space or switch to SD storage"
"Storage is low. Stop recording video. Clean up some space or switch to SD storage"
"Can\'t take photo with low battery and low storage"
"To tag photos and videos with locations, turn on GPS and wireless networks in Location settings."
"Gesture capture: Auto capture when gesture is detected:"
"Providing pose reference solutions from the scene"
